name: Hyper Skater
description:
Hyper Skater is a Platformer about a guy on a skateboard who rescues his friends.

To rescue his friends he must sacrifice energy from himself. But be careful: if the rescue cost too much energy you die.

The good news: there are collectables to refill part of your energy.

Controls:

  • AD OR < > to move left and right
  • Space to Jump

GamePlay:

  • Just touch your odd friend so that he gets the energy
  • Collectables can give you new energy

2 Levels are currently playable in this Jam Version.
